output.sentences: The bikes were all lined up along the pond because it was such a beautiful day outside.
It was so beautiful, that they decided to to go camping.
Some of the campers decided that a daytime mountain bike would be fun.
Others thought it would be better to ride at night.
He rode so fast he ended up in the middle of a race.
